theChemist:Antidote.NAME: Antidote
theChemist:Antidote.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add 1 Remedy Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:BeltPouch.NAME: Belt Pouch
theChemist:BeltPouch.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! card.

theChemist:BottomlessSack.NAME: Bottomless Sack
theChemist:BottomlessSack.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! random Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:ChickenKnife.NAME: Chicken Knife
theChemist:ChickenKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If your HP is below 10%, flee from combat instead. Exhaust.

theChemist:ChitinousBash.NAME: Chitinous Bash
theChemist:ChitinousBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. Add 1 Turtle Shell Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:DarkMatter.NAME: Dark Matter
theChemist:DarkMatter.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Add 1 Dark Matter Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:DefensivePosture.NAME: Defensive Posture
theChemist:DefensivePosture.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you add a Reagent to your stockpile, gain !M! Block.

theChemist:Disposal.NAME: Disposal
theChemist:Disposal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Fling your topmost Reagent.

theChemist:DizzyingFumes.NAME: Dizzying Fumes
theChemist:DizzyingFumes.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Imbalance to ALL enemies. Add 1 Dazed to your discard pile.

theChemist:DoubleDose.NAME: Double Dose
theChemist:DoubleDose.DESCRIPTION: Mix active Reagents and apply the effect twice.
theChemist:DoubleDose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Mix active Reagents and apply the effect twice.

theChemist:DragonFang.NAME: Dragon Fang
theChemist:DragonFang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add 1 Dragon Fang Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:Elixir.NAME: Elixir
theChemist:Elixir.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Heal !M! HP. Gain [R]. Exhaust.
theChemist:Elixir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Heal !M! HP. Gain [R] [R]. Exhaust.

theChemist:EqualExchange.NAME: Equal Exchange
theChemist:EqualExchange.DESCRIPTION: Turn the topmost Reagent in your stockpile into a random Reagent.

theChemist:Eyedrops.NAME: Eyedrops
theChemist:Eyedrops.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. Add 1 Remedy Reagent to your stockpile.
theChemist:Eyedrops.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Add 1 Remedy Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:FlaskBash.NAME: Flask Bash
theChemist:FlaskBash.DESCRIPTION: Mix active Reagents. Deal !D! damage. Add a Broken Flask to your hand. Exhaust.
theChemist:FlaskBash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Mix active Reagents. Deal !D! damage. Add a Broken Flask to your hand. Exhaust.

theChemist:FromNothing.NAME: From Nothing
theChemist:FromNothing.DESCRIPTION: The next time you add a Reagent to your stockpile this turn, add it twice.

theChemist:HastenedResearch.NAME: Hastened Research
theChemist:HastenedResearch.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Reagents from your stockpile. Draw 1 card and gain [R] for each Reagent removed this way. Exhaust.
theChemist:HastenedResearch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fling all Reagents in your stockpile. Draw 1 card and gain [R] for each Reagent flung this way. Exhaust.

theChemist:HeroCocktail.NAME: Hero Cocktail
theChemist:HeroCocktail.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack does double damage. Exhaust.
theChemist:HeroCocktail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! attacks do double damage. Exhaust.

theChemist:HiEther.NAME: Hi-Ether
theChemist:HiEther.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] [R]. Add 1 Hi-Ether Reagent to your stockpile. Exhaust.

theChemist:HiPotion.NAME: Hi-Potion
theChemist:HiPotion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Heal !M! HP. Add 1 Hi-Potion Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:Hoard.NAME: Hoard
theChemist:Hoard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add 2 Dragon Fang Reagents to your stockpile.

theChemist:HolyWater.NAME: Holy Water
theChemist:HolyWater.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust a random card in your hand.
theChemist:HolyWater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust a card in your hand.

theChemist:IronDraught.NAME: Iron Draught
theChemist:IronDraught.DESCRIPTION: The next damage you take is reduced by half. Exhaust.

theChemist:MaidensKiss.NAME: Maiden's Kiss
theChemist:MaidensKiss.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. Add 1 Remedy Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:Overstock.NAME: Overstock
theChemist:Overstock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Reagent in your stockpile.

theChemist:Pharmacology.NAME: Pharmacology
theChemist:Pharmacology.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of your next potion by 50%. Exhaust.
theChemist:Pharmacology.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of your next potion by 50%.

theChemist:PhoenixDown.NAME: Phoenix Down
theChemist:PhoenixDown.DESCRIPTION: Return up to !M! card from your exhaust pile to your hand. Add 1 Phoenix Down Reagent to your stockpile. Exhaust.
theChemist:PhoenixDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Return up to !M! cards from your exhaust pile to your hand. Add 1 Phoenix Down Reagent to your stockpile. Exhaust.

theChemist:PowerDrink.NAME: Power Drink
theChemist:PowerDrink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor at the start of each turn.

theChemist:Prowess.NAME: Prowess
theChemist:Prowess.DESCRIPTION: Increase the potency of Mix effects by 50%.

theChemist:Recover.NAME: Recover
theChemist:Recover.DESCRIPTION: Reduce your turn count on any Vulnerable, Frail, and Weakened debuffs by !M!. Gain !B! Block for each debuff this reduces.

theChemist:Roar.NAME: Roar
theChemist:Roar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Add 1 Dragon Fang Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:SageStaff.NAME: Sage Staff
theChemist:SageStaff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this card is Exhausted, heal !M! HP and gain !B! Block.

theChemist:Screen.NAME: Screen
theChemist:Screen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Fling your topmost Reagent.

theChemist:SleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
theChemist:SleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Fling your topmost Reagent, then return it to the bottom of your stockpile.

theChemist:StudiousResearch.NAME: Studious Research
theChemist:StudiousResearch.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for each Reagent in your stockpile.

theChemist:TakeStock.NAME: Take Stock
theChemist:TakeStock.DESCRIPTION: Move the topmost Reagent in your stockpile to the bottom.

theChemist:TurtleShell.NAME: Turtle Shell
theChemist:TurtleShell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add 1 Turtle Shell Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:VoidStrike.NAME: Void Strike
theChemist:VoidStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add 1 Dark Matter Reagent to your stockpile.

theChemist:VolatileConcoction.NAME: Volatile Concoction
theChemist:VolatileConcoction.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your stockpile contains at least 2 Reagents. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Remove all Reagents from your stockpile.

theChemist:WasteNot.NAME: Waste Not
theChemist:WasteNot.DESCRIPTION: Mix active Reagents, then return both consumed Reagents to your stockpile.
theChemist:WasteNot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Mix active Reagents, then return both consumed Reagents to your stockpile.

theChemist:Withdraw.NAME: Withdraw
theChemist:Withdraw.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add 1 Turtle Shell Reagent to your stockpile.
